about_the_game:
Bring the fury of the 4 elements to your game in a cool retro looking style with this animation pack! The power of Wind, Earth, Fire and Water on each pixel of these animations, in your hands!!!

Features:

- 32 unique pixelated animations.
- Animations based on the 4 elements (Fire, Water, Wind and Earth).
- Some of the animations will look like an evolution from the previous (good for "evolving powers").
- Rendered at 15 FPS to match RPG Maker's FPS (and to give a retro looking aspect).
- Included animated gifs for a fast previewing outside the RPG Maker editor.
- Included a animation data file for an easy copy and paste setting.
- Included some tutorials on how to set up the animations

* This pack contains the same designed animations content as Elemental Fury Animations Pack by Bis but with pixel effects

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
